questions.quote: So I think we should just forget the whole deal, and go back to being friends.
Hey, Elaine, you have got to buy this new electric toothbrush I just got - the Ori-dent.
Now, lookit, this plane leaves at 10:15. We're getting up at about eight. That gives us enough time, right?
Do you hear what I'm saying to you?! I'm telling you that if I don't go, I could die. Die. Is it worth dying for?
And I didn't even ask her out. She asked me out first. She called me up. What was I supposed to do? Say no?  I can't do that to someone.
First you make a cell-phone walk-and-talk, then she loses a call-waiting face-off, now you're talking about a plane call?
Sometimes it's good to have a pencil to write these things down.
Hey, Kramer, it's Elaine, thanks for bringing my mattress back. And I guess I'll just get my spare key from you - whenever. All right, bye.
Hello Darren, this is Jerry from Jerry's office. . We're going to be three for lunch.  What do you mean he's already left?
Well if a couple breaks up and have plans to go to a neutral place, who withdraws? What's the etiquette?
